property.name: objectLabel
property.value: Attribute Definition

property.name: objectDescription
property.value: Dictionary data for Attributes (or fields) that exist on an object.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Child Entry Name

property.name: label
property.value: Child Entry Name

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Data Type

property.name: summary
property.value: The type of data this attribite (field) holds.

property.name: label
property.value: Data Type

property.name: description
property.value: The type of data this attribite (field) holds. I.e. STRING, INTEGER, DATE, LONG, DATETIME, COMPLEX, etc.

property.name: objectLabel
property.value: Data Type

property.name: objectDescription
property.value: The type of data this attribite (field) holds. I.e. STRING, INTEGER, DATE, LONG, DATETIME, COMPLEX, etc.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Is Required

property.name: summary
property.value: The required element allows values of "true" or "false".

property.name: label
property.value: Is Required

property.name: description
property.value: The required element allows values of "true" or "false". A value of "true" indicates that a value must be entered for this business object when creating or editing a new business object.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Min Occurs

property.name: summary
property.value:
The minimum number of allowed occurences
TODO: get Rice to rename this to getMinOccurs to it matches the setter.

property.name: label
property.value: Minimum Occurences

property.name: description
property.value:
The minimum number of allowed occurences
TODO: get Rice to rename this to getMinOccurs to it matches the setter.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Max Occurs

property.name: summary
property.value:
The maximum number of allowed occurences of this field
TODO: Get RICE to rename this getMaxOccurs so it matches the setter TODO: Get RICE to set a value that means UNBOUNDED, perhaps 999999999

property.name: label
property.value: Maximum Occurrences

property.name: description
property.value:
The maximum number of allowed occurences of this field
TODO: Get RICE to rename this getMaxOccurs so it matches the setter TODO: Get RICE to set a value that means UNBOUNDED, perhaps 999999999

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Min Length

property.name: summary
property.value: The miniumum length allowed for the field.

property.name: label
property.value: Minimum Length

property.name: description
property.value: The miniumum length allowed for the field.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Max Length

property.name: summary
property.value: The maxLength element determines the maximum size of the field for data entry edit purposes and for display purposes.

property.name: label
property.value: Maximum Length

property.name: description
property.value: The maxLength element determines the maximum size of the field for data entry edit purposes and for display purposes.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Is Force Uppercase

property.name: summary
property.value: Converts user entry to uppercase and always display database value as uppercase.

property.name: label
property.value: Force Uppercase

property.name: description
property.value: Converts user entry to uppercase and always display database value as uppercase.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Short Label

property.name: summary
property.value: The shortLabel element is the field or collection name that will be used in applications when a shorter name (than the label element) is required.

property.name: label
property.value: Short Label

property.name: description
property.value: The shortLabel element is the field or collection name that will be used in applications when a shorter name (than the label element) is required. This will be overridden by presence of displayLabelAttribute element.

property.name: summary
property.value: The summary element is used to provide a short description of the attribute or collection.

property.name: description
property.value: The summary element is used to provide a short description of the attribute or collection. This is designed to be used for help purposes.

property.name: summary
property.value: The label element is the field or collection name that will be shown on inquiry and maintenance screens.

property.name: description
property.value: The label element is the field or collection name that will be shown on inquiry and maintenance screens. This will be overridden by presence of displayLabelAttribute element.

property.name: summary
property.value: The description element is used to provide a long description of the attribute or collection.

property.name: description
property.value: The description element is used to provide a long description of the attribute or collection. This is designed to be used for help purposes.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Exclusive Min

property.name: summary
property.value: The exclusiveMin element determines the minimum allowable value for data entry editing purposes.

property.name: label
property.value: Exclusive Minimum

property.name: description
property.value: The exclusiveMin element determines the minimum allowable value for data entry editing purposes. Value can be an integer or decimal value such as -.001 or 99.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Inclusive Max

property.name: summary
property.value: The inclusiveMax element determines the maximum allowable value for data entry editing purposes.

property.name: label
property.value: Exclusive Maximum

property.name: description
property.value:
The inclusiveMax element determines the maximum allowable value for data entry editing purposes. Value can be an integer or decimal value such as -.001 or 99.
JSTL: This field is mapped into the field named "exclusiveMax".

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Display Label Attribute

property.name: summary
property.value: The displayLabelAttribute element is used to indicate that the label and short label should be obtained from another attribute.

property.name: label
property.value: Display Label Attribute

property.name: description
property.value:
The displayLabelAttribute element is used to indicate that the label and short label should be obtained from another attribute.
The label element and short label element defined for this attribute will be overridden. Instead, the label and short label values will be obtained by referencing the corresponding values from the attribute indicated by this element.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Is Unique

property.name: summary
property.value: Similar to a db column that is flagged as unique, the value is unique across all data objects of that type

property.name: description
property.value: Similar to a db column that is flagged as unique, the value is unique across all data objects of that type

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Custom Validator Class

property.name: summary
property.value: Class to do custom validation

property.name: label
property.value: Custom Validator Class

property.name: description
property.value: Class to do custom validation

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Formatter Class

property.name: summary
property.value: The formatterClass element is used when custom formatting is required for display of the field value.

property.name: label
property.value: Formatter Class

property.name: description
property.value: The formatterClass element is used when custom formatting is required for display of the field value. This field specifies the name of the java class to be used for the formatting. About 15 different classes are available including BooleanFormatter, CurrencyFormatter, DateFormatter, etc.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Valid Characters Constraint

property.name: summary
property.value:
The constraint that applies regular expressions to to the value
TODO: Ask RICE to create an interface for ValidCharactersConstraint so we can return that instead of the generic constraint

property.name: label
property.value: Valid Characters Constraint

property.name: description
property.value:
The constraint that applies regular expressions to to the value
TODO: Ask RICE to create an interface for ValidCharactersConstraint so we can return that instead of the generic constraint

property.name: objectLabel
property.value: Valid Characters Constraint

property.name: objectDescription
property.value:
The constraint that applies regular expressions to to the value
TODO: Ask RICE to create an interface for ValidCharactersConstraint so we can return that instead of the generic constraint

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Js Value

property.name: summary
property.value: Javascript version of the regex defined in value.

property.name: label
property.value: Java Script Value

property.name: description
property.value:
Javascript version of the regex defined in value. This does not have to be set if this constraint's key maps to one of the default valid character methods contained in jQuery - (insert that list here). This must be set if there is NO default method that matches the label key and applyClientSide is true.
This is completely ignored if applyClientSide is set to false.

property.name: summary
property.value:
The Java based regex for valid characters There are two forms: regex:xxxxx and just: xxxx
If the 2nd form then it is interpreted as a simple list of valid characters.

property.name: description
property.value:
The Java based regex for valid characters There are two forms: regex:xxxxx and just: xxxx
If the 2nd form then it is interpreted as a simple list of valid characters. Note: it is actualy converted to a regular expression by wrapping it in [].

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Is Apply Client Side

property.name: summary
property.value: If this is true, the constraint should be applied on the client side when the user interacts with a field - if this constraint can be interpreted for client side use.

property.name: label
property.value: Is Apply Client Side

property.name: description
property.value: If this is true, the constraint should be applied on the client side when the user interacts with a field - if this constraint can be interpreted for client side use. Default is true.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Label Key

property.name: summary
property.value: LabelKey should be a single word key.

property.name: label
property.value: Label Key

property.name: description
property.value: LabelKey should be a single word key. This key is used to find a message to use for this constraint from available messages. The key is also used for defining/retrieving validation method names when applicable - as such this key MUST exist for valid character constraints.
